name: Shitty Tetris AI
description:
WARNING!! full screening fucks up the buttons for some reason 

Settings:

AI SPEED = the speed at which the AI moves pieces

AI HOLE HATE AMOUNT = how much the AI doesn't want to place a block over a hole

AI DISTANCE DOWN = how much the AI wants to place the tetromino lower down

AI HATE PILLARS AMOUNT = how much the AI doesn't want to make pillars where only long pieces can fill it in

AI HOLES BENEATH HOLES HATE = how much the AI doesn't want to block off multiple holes

AI  LOVE FOR CLEARING LINES = how much the AI wants to clear lines

AI ABOVE HIGHEST SQUARE HATE = how much the AI doesn't want to place a tetromino above the highest square
